table.name: vtiger_vgsmultisender
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vgsmultisender` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `server_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `user_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` text NOT NULL, `email_from` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `from_name` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `batch_count` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `batch_delay` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `smtp_auth` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
